sentences.english: Flashes its inner pectoral fins when disturbed (Ref. 9710).
sentences.chinese: 闪现它的内胸鳍当被惊扰时。

sentences.english: The three pairs of armored legs assist in this pumping motion, as do a pair of pectoral guidance fins.
sentences.chinese: 三对披甲的肢脚和一对导航胸鳍协助这一水泵式运动。

sentences.english: The combined head, trunk and enlarged pectoral fins of some cartilaginous fishes with depressed bodies.
sentences.chinese: 体盘头部，身体以及延长的胸鳍所共同形成的体盘。

sentences.english: The bones of the forearm displayed proportions reminiscent of the pectoral fin of Eusthenopteron.
sentences.chinese: 前臂的骨骼呈现的比例，非常像真掌鳍鱼的胸鳍。

sentences.english: Even smaller pectoral fins located near the back of the head are used for steering.
sentences.chinese: 位于靠近头后面的更小的胸鳍用于控制方向。

sentences.english: He oxygenates the eggs by fanning them with his pectoral fins.
sentences.chinese: 他以扇动胸鳍的方式来为受精卵供氧。

sentences.english: Pay special attention to the pectoral muscles.
sentences.chinese: 注意胸鳍肌肉，这是每日护理的一个部分。

definition: ambulatory leg (of a crab, lobster, spider etc)
